allow:
Bash(gh issue create --title "Flash of Unstyled Content (FOUC) on trial cards" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Problem
Trial cards experience Flash of Unstyled Content (FOUC) during state transitions, causing visible flickering and poor user experience. Buttons become faded/unclickable during transitions, and animations are too slow (>100ms).

## Root Causes
- Fade animations were 300-600ms, causing noticeable delays
- Race conditions in allowUserInput/stopUserInput synchronization
- Template rendering race conditions
- Orphaned {{/if}} tags causing parse errors
- CSS transitions not optimized for instant feedback

## Solution
Reduced all fade animations to <100ms, fixed race conditions, optimized CSS transitions, and removed invalid template tags.

## Related Commits
- 78088ad1 - Initial FOUC analysis and documentation
- f093f62a - Complete FOUC fixes implementation

## Files Changed
- `mofacts/client/views/experiment/card.html` - Reduced fade times, removed orphaned tags
- `mofacts/client/views/experiment/card.js` - Fixed race conditions in input handling
- `mofacts/public/styles/classic.css` - Optimized CSS transitions
- `mofacts/client/index.html` - Template optimization

## Testing
Manual testing confirmed buttons are now immediately clickable and transitions are smooth without visible flicker.
EOF
)")
